ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Velious Attempt at travelling
ygData.msgSnippet: I know the one you are talking about, I believe it is called a coldain velium sword.  procs at level 1, proc is a 25 pt dd.  worthwhile, from what i hear,
ygData.messageBody:
I know the one you are talking about, I believe it is called a coldain velium sword.  procs at level 1, proc is a 25 pt dd.  worthwhile, from what i hear, until you get to the point where you can get something better.  don't know the stats right offhand, but are probably pretty closeto those of a FS weapon.
 
Rich
From: Rob LeBeau
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, June 17, 2002 3:25 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Velious Attempt at travelling

I have a velium sword which does not proc intil level
25 for my ranger.  I hear there is one at a merchant
that procs at level 1.

It is just a thought.

Rob
--- erik <naslund@...> wrote:
> > From: "Rob LeBeau" <rlebeau65@...>
> >
> > What would the odds be for a level 20 druid to
> travel
> > to THurgadim - spelling - by way of boat and camo
> and
> > by using edges and walls to maybe get to
> Thurgadim?
> >
> > I am trying to see if I can purchase a Velium
> Sword
> > sold by a vendor there.
> >
> > If this it totally stupid, then please say
> so.....lol
>
> Why would you want to buy a vendor-bought sword
> anyway?
>
> As for the question, with SoW, Invis, and lev, not
> that hard.  Probably
> easier to just get a port to GD.
>
>
